```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
#Display anscombe
anscombe
```

```{r}
#Wrangling the data
ansc <-
  bind_cols(
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("x")) %>% 
      gather(dataset, "x"),
    anscombe %>% 
      select(matches("y")) %>% 
      gather(key, "y")
  ) %>%
  select(-key) %>% 
  mutate(dataset = gsub("x", "", dataset)) %>%  
  as_tibble()

ansc
```
